en.av_c1: The initial call is to move disk 5 from A to B
en.av_c2: This will require moving disk 4 from A to C
en.av_c3: This will require moving disk 3 from A to B
en.av_c4: This will require moving disk 2 from A to C
en.av_c5: This will require moving disk 1 from A to B
en.av_c6: This will require moving disk 0 from A to C and that what we are going to do directly.
en.av_c7: Return from recursive call and continue to disk 1 where we left off.
en.av_c8: Disk 1 moved and we need to move smaller disks.
en.av_c9: Return from recursive call and continue to disk 2 where we left off.
en.av_c10: Disk 2 moved and we need to move smaller disks.
en.av_c11: Return from recursive call and continue to disk 1 where we left off.
en.av_c12: Disk 1 moved and we need to move smaller disks.
en.av_c13: This process will repeat till we have all the disks moved to support B  as we will see in the rest of this tracing visualization:
